name: National Mall
description: A national park in Washington, D.C., home to many monuments and museums.

name: Great Wall of China
description: A series of fortifications made of stone, brick, tamped earth, wood, and other materials.

name: Golden Gate Bridge
description: A suspension bridge spanning the Golden Gate, the one-mile-wide strait connecting San Francisco Bay and the Pacific Ocean.

name: Alcatraz Island
description: A former prison located on an island in the San Francisco Bay, known for its infamous inmates.

name: Fisherman's Wharf
description: A popular tourist area in San Francisco, known for its seafood, shops, and attractions.

name: Palace of Fine Arts
description: A monumental structure in the Marina District, known for its classical architecture and tranquil lagoon.

name: Lombard Street
description: A famous crooked street in San Francisco, known for its steep, winding path and beautiful flowers.

name: Chinatown
description: The oldest Chinatown in North America, known for its vibrant culture, shops, and restaurants.

name: Coit Tower
description: A tower perched on Telegraph Hill, offering panoramic views of San Francisco and the Bay.

name: Pier 39
description: A popular shopping and dining destination in San Francisco, known for its sea lions and bay views.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: A symbolic monument located in New York Harbor, gifted by France.

name: Grand Canyon
description: A massive canyon in Arizona, carved by the Colorado River over millions of years.

name: Mount Rushmore
description: A monumental sculpture in the Black Hills of South Dakota, featuring four U.S. presidents.

name: Niagara Falls
description: A group of powerful waterfalls straddling the border between the United States and Canada.

name: Yellowstone National Park
description: The first national park in the world, known for its geothermal features and wildlife.

name: Times Square
description: A brightly illuminated commercial intersection in Midtown Manhattan, New York City.

name: Empire State Building
description: A iconic skyscraper in Midtown Manhattan, offering panoramic views of the city.

name: Rocky Mountain National Park
description: A national park in Colorado, featuring majestic mountain scenery and diverse wildlife.

name: Disneyland Park
description: A theme park in Anaheim, California, known as 'The Happiest Place on Earth.'

name: Space Needle
description: A iconic tower in Seattle, offering panoramic views of the city and the Puget Sound.
